Title: Hope 1997 REU Information
Body: Also, information is available from the World Wide Web as the page "http://www.cs.hope.edu/~dershem/info.html" Research Projects Hope College Computer Science Summer 1997 Project 1: Concurrency Anomaly Prevention Using Java Threads ( Michael J. Jipping ) This project will implement the prediction and detection of concurrency anomalies in the language Java.
